import { Stack } from '@mui/material' import { Button } from '@mui/material' import { Typography } from '@mui/material' import { Box } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import { amenities as allAmenities} from "../../utils/amenities" export const RoomDetail = ({ roooms }) => { const title = roooms.title const capacity = roooms.capacity const amenities = roooms.amenities const allows = roooms.allows const donts = roooms.donts const description = roooms.description const price = roooms.price const imgUrl = roooms.imgUrl console.log(amenities) { allAmenities && allAmenities.filter((services) => { amenities.map((service) => { if (service === services.name){ return
{service.icon}
} })})} return ( Amenities {/* { allAmenities && allAmenities.filter((services) => { amenities.map((service) => { if (service === services.name){ return
{service.icon}
} })})} */} ${price} Description {description} ) }
